## About
I am an MBA student specializing in Finance & Accounting at University Canada West, with 6+ years of experience in accounting operations, reconciliations, and financial reporting. I’ve worked with global organizations including VMware, Urban Ladder, and Genpact—improving process efficiency, vendor management, and documentation accuracy. I enjoy using analytics and automation to enhance financial transparency and decision-making. I’m seeking roles in finance/accounting where precision and process improvement are key.

## Education
**MBA (Finance & Accounting)** — University Canada West, Vancouver *(Expected 2026)*  
**BBM (Accounting & Finance)** — Andhra University, India

## Experience Highlights
**Business Analyst — VMware India** *(2022–2024)*  
- Performed end-to-end bank reconciliations and variance analysis supporting accurate financial reporting.  
- Partnered with finance/legal to streamline documentation workflows and audit compliance.

**After-Sales Analyst — Urban Ladder** *(2018–2020)*
